name: Mini Golf Star 2
description:
Mini Golf Stars is back and better than ever! The follow-up to one of the best and most popular golf games of all time! Mini Golf Stars 2 has insanely fun courses, high-stakes multiplayer, and insane gameplay. Excellent for playing a round of Putt-Putt with the family, or challenging players from around the world. With five different types of courses, putters will never get tired of the over 200 plus unique and challenging holes!

"I'm addicted. One of the best sports games I have ever played." – Stamper83

"My Family Loves it! Best golf game on the phone, hands down." -wsopkid

SEE & FEEL THE SENSATION OF A REAL MINI GOLF GAME
Mini Golf Stars offers the closest golf game simulation since Golden Tee Golf. Smooth and Precise touch controls let you feel the greens and sink that clutch birdie putt to earn 3 STARS. Blaze your way across the beautiful course to unlock all levels. Do you have what it takes to conquer the most fun game on iPhone and iPad?

"I bet I could beat Tiger Woods on these holes! So good!" - PZFosat
"Next stop is the PGA! I can't put this down" - ToroToro Bull

TAKE ON COURSES THAT YOU COULD ONLY DREAM OF!
Moving obstacles, ramps and jumps, bridges, and more await you on the most creative courses ever. Now you can show off your putting skills with new video recording and social sharing. Show off to your Facebook friends and Twitter followers just who is the best trick shot arrest around!

SEE HOW YOU STACK UP AGAINST OUR HIGH STAKES TOURNAMENTS
With 3 Hole Matchups, Mini Golf Stars 2 will test your skills to see if you have what it takes. Weekly leaderboards will determine the champ and reward them with trophies and prizes!

FEATURES:
• 1 of a Kind Golf Game Scoring System.
• Play Skillz Multiplayer Tournaments Against Other Users (www.Skillz.com)
• Weekly Leaderboard prizes
• Earn Trophies with Real Cash Rewards!
• Collect Golf Bux and Redeem for Cash, Cars, or Other Awesome Prizes!
• Over 200 Unique Holes that Range in Difficulty from Easy to Nearly Impossible.

CONTACT:
Please Rate Fairly - If you have any improvements or words to share about the game, please drop us a line at support@gamemasons.net - We want to hear what you have to say!

Universal App - Runs on all the latest iOS Devices
• iPad 2, 3, 4, Air, Mini.
• iPhone 4, 4S, 5, 5s, 5c.
• iPod 5.
